product_name: Mountain Hardwear Heracles Gloves - Women's - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Mountain Hardwear's Heracles Gloves for women sport waterproof, Insulated, close-fitting gauntlets that ride under your jacket cuffs, eliminating cold spots and keeping snow and moisture out.
